title: Dave Arnold's Thai Basil Daiquiri Recipe
full_text:
Dave Arnold's Thai Basil Daiquiri Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
2 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
10
large
Thai basil leaves
1 1/2
ounces
simple syrup
(see note)
2
ounces
juice
from about
4
whole
limes
4
ounces
white rum
, such as Flor de Cana
Pinch
salt
Directions
Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, pour blended mixture into shaker, shake until very cold. Strain through fine-mesh strainer into 2 cocktail glasses.
Special equipment
Blender, cocktail shaker, cocktail stariner, fine-mesh strainer
Frozen Drinks
Rum
